name: Great Spring Nut Hunt
description:
Controls:

WASD to move

Spacebar to Jump and skip through dialogue

Help this hungry little squirrel track down as many acorns as possible to replenish their lost stores. Jump nimbly through the still sleeping forest to collect as many as you can find, then return home to sleep some more.

Nut Hunt is my entry for the 2021 Great Spring Game Jam run by Firith Studio.

All the code and sprite art was made by me, using Aseprite (Pixel Art software) and the Godot Engine. 

Music made by:

https://opengameart.org/users/yubatake (80s TV theme, used in Main Menu)

https://opengameart.org/users/locomule (Digital Bananas, used as game soundtrack)

SFX made by:

https://freesound.org/people/seachangeau/

https://freesound.org/people/Fupicat/
